primitiveValues.formulaTemplate:
Interac e-Transfer service lets you deposit funds electronically, 24 hours a day, 7 days a week even during holidays.

Timeframe: Interac e-Transfers typically land to us within 0-30 minutes after you send the e-Transfer.

Limit: Most financial institutions in Canada have typical e-Transfer limits of C$3,000.00 per transaction, cumulative within a 24-hour period. Please ensure you are within these limits by contacting your financial institution for more information about your sending limits.

Your Ndax CAD wallet has a monthly deposit limit of C$10,000,000.00. This limit is reset at the end of every month and includes the sum of all deposits from our available funding methods; Interac e-Transfers and wire transfers.

Fees: Ndax does not charge deposit fees.
